mapper.select: select email from user where user_id=#{user_id}

select u.nickname, u.job, avg(r.star_point)as avg_star_point, f.address, f.switchAt, f.introduction from user u left join f_info f on user_id=f_id left join review r on seller_id = user_id where u.type=2 and u.user_id=#{user_id} group by user_id;
mapper.insert: insert into f_info (f_id, address, address2, introduction) value(#{user_id}, #{address}, #{address2}, #{introduction});
mapper.update: update user set type=2, updatedAt=current_timestamp() where user_id=#{user_id}
